articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects October 3 Dockyard under KPA Navy Unit 597
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects October 3 Dockyard under KPA Navy Unit 597
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, gave field guidance to the October 3 Dockyard under KPA Navy Unit 597 and set forth the task for its updating.
					 There he looked round the monument to on-site guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and rooms devoted to the education in revolutionary history and to the history of the dockyard.
					
					 Seeing the historic mementoes and data, he recalled with deep emotion the course of development of the dockyard, which was built as the country's first base for warship repair in July 1947 at the instruction of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 And he noted that when visiting the dockyard in the last year of his life, leader Kim Jong Il gave the important tasks that would serve as guidelines in operating it, underlining the importance of its duty.
					
					 Thanks to the far-sighted wisdom of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the East and West Sea Fleets of the KPA Navy could have solid material and technical foundations whereby to repair any type of warship in a short period, he said.
					
					 Then the Supreme Commander went round the engine repair work-team, trial operation ground, dock, quay and other parts of the dockyard to learn in detail about the repairing of warships and working conditions and living environment of its employees.
					
					 He stressed the need for the dockyard to update its production processes in line with the requirement of the age of knowledge-based economy so as to successfully carry out the task of repairing warships and contribute to the modernization of warships. 
					
					 He instructed officials to give the dockyard a complete facelift to make its interior and exterior quite different from what they used to be as well as to build cultural and welfare establishments and a scientific and technological dissemination room in a perfect way.
					
					 He also said that the dockyard should be equipped with better sewage disposal facilities in conformity with the scientific and technological requirements to prevent the industrial waste water from polluting the sea.
					
					 The October 3 Dockyard has a very important role to play in developing the navy, he said, and called for turning it into a model and standard dockyard in the country, adding that the party would solve all problems arising in doing it.
					
					 He expressed belief that the dockyard would be successfully renovated on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the WPK to make a tangible contribution to the repair and modernization of various battleships and the development of the nation's shipbuilding industry.
					
					 Accompanying him were Army Col. Gen. Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Hong Yong Chil, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: KPA Commanding Officers Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
KPA Commanding Officers Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Commanding officers of the Korean People's Army visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Sunday, the birthday of the regular revolutionary armed forces of Korea. 
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square of marking the war victory.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid deep respects for the victors in the great age.
					
					 At the hall of building the regular armed forces, they looked round the historic relics showing the undying army building exploits of the peerless great persons, being briefed that the President developed the KPRA into the regular revolutionary armed forces in a short period since the country's liberation.
					
					 They also looked round the first submachine guns of the DPRK which the President awarded to the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and the first colors of the KPA made by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and military uniforms of all services in the period of building the regular armed forces.
					
					 They were also deeply moved by photos and revolutionary relics and data dealing with the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are paying the highest respect to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the birthday of the regular revolutionary armed forces of Korea (February 8). 
					 Service personnel and people paid tribute to the statues of the Generalissimos at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and KPA General Staff and units and bouquets and flowers. 
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues in humblest reverence. 
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were also laid before the statues of the Generalissimos at the Ministry of People's Security, Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics and other military academies and large combined units of the KPA. 
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flower were also laid before the statues of the Generalissimos and mosaics portraying their smiling images in Pyongyang and local areas.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces took place on Sunday, the 67th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's strengthening of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 The dancing party began with the song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The participants danced, looking back upon the feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in leading the army building.
					
					 They danced to the tune of "Song of Airman", "Meaningful Soldiers' Days" and other songs.
					
					 They also danced to the tune of songs "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colors of the Supreme Commander" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives", vowing to provide a sure guarantee for the party's cause with arms under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Meanwhile, dancing parties took place at KPA units and military academies at all levels on the same day.

articles.title: School Youth and Children in Pyongyang Mark Anniversary of Regular Armed Forces
articles.content:
School Youth and Children in Pyongyang Mark Anniversary of Regular Armed Forces 
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- School youth and children in Pyongyang gathered at Kim Il Sung Square on Sunday to mark the birthday of the regular revolutionary armed forces of Korea. They played brass band and marched in array.
					 Ri Kwang Chol, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the youth league, said in his speech that President Kim Il Sung developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces, the Korean People's Army on Feb. 8, 1948. Thanks to this significant day, the DPRK could win one victory after another in the standoff with imperialism and U.S. and the struggle to defend socialism generation after generation, he added. 
					
					 School youth and children loudly sang in chorus the song "For My Only Motherland", holding aloft flags of the Republic that carry the soul of the revolutionary forerunners. 
					
					 Then followed the march. 
					
					 The columns marching past to the tune of songs including "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung," "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives," "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only" and "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" reflected the strong will of young people to successfully carry forward the victorious traditions of the Korean People's Army that inherited the brilliant traditions of the anti-Japanese guerrillas.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and working people laid wreaths before the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Sunday, the 67th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's strengthening of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 A wreath in name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and units of the KPA and bouquets were laid on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes".
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of martyrs.
					
					 They looked round the cemetery.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building Regular Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building Regular Revolutionary Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday editorially marks the 67th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's strengthening of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 He strengthened the KPRA into the Korean People's Army on Feb. 8, 1948, a significant event that opened a new turning phase of building the revolutionary armed forces that had been pioneered on Mt. Paektu, it says, adding:
					
					 Under his leadership, the revolutionary armed forces entered the higher stage of its development. Therefore, the Korean people could firmly preserve the freedom and independence of the country and gains of the revolution from the encroachment of the U.S. imperialists and all enemies, and dynamically advance the revolution and construction by relying on powerful military capabilities. 
					
					 He strengthened the Korean revolutionary armed forces into the regular revolutionary armed forces and laid a firm foundation for victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche. His immortal feats will shine forever in the history of the country.
					
					 No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how frequently one generation is replaced by another, unchangeable is the mission of the Paektusan arms handed down by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary nature of the KPA holding the red flag of the Workers' Party of Korea as the first military flag. 
					
					 Sure is the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun as great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism indicates the way to be followed by us and there is the wise leadership of the Party, the single-minded unity of all service personnel and people and invincible KPA.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Authorities to Behave Themselves
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Authorities to Behave Themselves
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Channel A Broadcasting Service of south Korea on Feb. 5 aired a documentary slandering the DPRK. 
					 It said the "north is cultivating hostility towards the U.S. through brain-washing education as part of its efforts for reinforcing the system" and that the north is spreading a "false story" that the U.S. used germ weapons during the Korean War and is deploying chemical weapons on Okinawa. 
					
					 This is a traitorous crime which could be done only by the poor colonial stooges of the U.S. and rare traitors as they unhesitatingly leave the destiny of the nation at the tender mercy of the U.S. while kowtowing to it, says Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. busy with the frantic campaign to bring down the DPRK and the south Korean authorities which have pursued confrontation policy in reliance on outsiders are entirely to blame for the present acute situation. 
					
					 Now the south Korean puppet group, bereft of reason, is coming out as a shock brigade of the U.S. to stifle the fellow countrymen and maintain its shaking ruling system by currying favor with its master. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave themselves, clearly seeing why the situation of the Korean peninsula goes to an extreme phase. 
					
					 If they continue to slander the fellow countrymen and get frantic with the confrontation racket in favor of the U.S., they will face ruin together with their U.S. master.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Halt to S. Korea-U.S. Submarine Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Halt to S. Korea-U.S. Submarine Drill
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in Pusan, south Korea at a press conference in front of the Submarine Command in Jinhae naval base in South Kyongsang Province on Feb. 5 strongly demanded a halt to the south Korea-U.S. combined submarine drill chilling the atmosphere of dialogue between the north and the south.
					 At the press conference the organization recalled that the Submarine Command was formed. It charged that the U.S. nuclear submarine Olympia entered the Jinhae naval base on Jan. 30 and took part in the drill on Feb. 5.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. was keen on war exercises in the East and West seas of Korea by introducing Aegis destroyer in south Korea from the outset of the year and is now revealing its attempt for preemptive attack on the north with nuclear submarine involved. The U.S. recently held a top-secret strategy meeting simulating a war on the Korean peninsula and discussed a plan for special war.
					
					 The organization denounced the military drill aimed to mount a preemptive attack on the north as a dangerous act that chills the atmosphere of dialogue and causes an all-out war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It demanded an immediate halt to the submarine drill for aggression.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Aerial War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Aerial War Drill
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet army started large-scale aerial war exercises, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Largest-ever military hardware including ten flying units and weapons and equipment of all kinds were involved in the aerial combat drill now underway in Chongju, North Chungchong Province from Feb. 2 to 13.
					
					 FA-50 fighter was involved in the drill. It was deployed for an actual war in October last year.
					
					 The warmongers openly blustered that the on-going drill is aimed to cope with someone's "infiltration".

articles.title: Wednesday Rally in S. Korea Demands Japan's Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Wednesday Rally in S. Korea Demands Japan's Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The 1164th Wednesday rally was held outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Feb. 4 demanding the solution to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 At the rally speakers said that one more woman who had her chastity mercilessly violated by the Imperial Japanese Army died on Jan. 31.
					
					 The Japanese government has not yet opted for settling the sexual slavery issue, the speakers said.
					
					 They urged Japan to make a formal apology and legal reparation to the victims.
					
					 A similar Wednesday rally was also held in Osaka, Japan on the same day.
					
					 The rally was participated in by representatives of south Korean organizations.
					
					 The participants urged Japan to come out for the settlement of the issue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Bangladeshi Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Bangladeshi Personage
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, praised leader Kim Jong Il's exploits at the releasing ceremony of his work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" held at a publishing house in Dhaka, Bangladesh on February 3.
					 He said in his speech:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power by wisely leading the Workers' Party of Korea, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 He made sure that President Kim Il Sung who founded the party and led it for nearly half a century was held in high esteem for all ages and that the Juche idea was held fast to as the invariable guiding idea.

articles.title: U.S. Criminal Acts of Blocking Improvement of North-South Ties and Reunification of Korea Indicted
articles.content:
U.S. Criminal Acts of Blocking Improvement of North-South Ties and Reunification of Korea Indicted 
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute issued an indictment on Sunday revealing the thrice-cursed crimes committed by the U.S. by viciously blocking the improvement of the north-south relations and reunification.
					 The indictment said the U.S. is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it has illegally occupied south Korea for 70 years and viciously blocked the improvement of the north-south relations and reunification.
					
					 It noted:
					
					 After the liberation of Korea the U.S. worked hard to scuttle the Joint Conference that was convened in April 1948 for the establishment of the unified democratic government and fabricated the Syngman Rhee puppet regime, causing the division of the country.
					
					 As it sustained a big defeat in the Korean war and faced the crisis of being expelled from south Korea, the U.S. let loose a string of brigandish remarks that "it can never withdraw as it suffered the loss of hundreds of thousands of lives in Korea", wantonly violating the Armistice Agreement on withdrawing all foreign forces and peacefully settling the Korean issue.
					
					 The U.S. obstructions have become all the more undisguised in the 2000s when the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted as a result of the historic Pyongyang summit of the leaders of the north and the south and when the spirit for reconciliation, unity and reunification mounted high between the north and the south.
					
					 The U.S. moves to check the improvement of the north-south relations and the reunification of Korea have become more frantic since the emergence of the present regime.
					
					 Early last year when the north-south high-ranking contacts were made and the atmosphere of dialogue and improvement of the relations were created as evidenced by the reunions of separated families and relatives thanks to the sincere efforts made by the DPRK, the U.S. resorted to all sorts of vicious moves.
					
					 Due to the U.S. obstructions, the sincere efforts made by the DPRK for the improvement of the north-south relations and the national reunification did not see due results and the north-south relations have been further deteriorated.
					
					 The U.S. strained the situation on the Korean peninsula to the extremity through the frantic racket for the war of aggression against the DPRK, the indictment said, and went on:
					
					 After the liberation of Korea the U.S. conducted madcap war exercises and made military provocations in the areas along the 38th parallel, finally igniting a war.
					
					 When there took place a political meeting to discuss the ways of achieving peaceful settlement of the Korean issue after the war, the U.S. pressed for Focus Lens joint military exercises between the U.S. imperialist aggression forces from 1954 and the south Korean puppet army to scuttle the meeting. In the 1960s it staged mad-cap Foal Eagle joint military exercises, constantly straining the situation.
					
					 From 1976 the U.S. staged ill-famed Team Spirit and Ulji Focus Lens joint military drills, pushing the north-south relations to the phase of confrontation.
					
					 It also gradually expanded the scale and duration of the drills.
					
					 It committed military provocations including the armed conflict in the West Sea in 2002 one after another.
					
					 The anti-DPRK war drills that the enemies staged last year clearly prove how the U.S. has worked hard to block the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 Disclosing the fact that the U.S. moves have reached the extremity this year, the indictment continues:
					
					 A typical example is the "additional sanctions" the Obama administration imposed on the DPRK under the pretext of hacking at the Sony Pictures Entertainment.
					
					 The U.S. puts pressure in every way on the puppet authorities to prevent them from holding dialogue despite its loud claim that it "supports the north-south dialogue."
					
					 The puppet authorities which loudly claimed they were open to the north-south dialogue from the outset of the new year are making such poor sophism as "unreasonable precondition of the north", yielding to the U.S. pressure. This act aimed to shift the blame on to the DPRK side only to reveal their plight as a colonial stooge and henchman.
					
					 The U.S., not content with this, viciously conducts smear campaign against the DPRK to incite hostility toward it.
					
					 Moreover, from the outset of the new year the U.S. has been hell-bent on arms buildup and anti-DPRK war drills, deliberately straining the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The indictment continued as follows:
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind the stern warnings issued by the arms of Mt. Paektu that it will be forced to drink a bitter cup of final destruction if it continues to pursue the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and the aggression moves against it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clarify whether it would open the road to the improvement of the north-south ties and reunification from the stand of By Our Nation Itself or continue war moves and the moves of inciting confrontation between social systems in collusion with the U.S. that is little short of bringing calamity upon themselves.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently stands in the way of the improvement of the north-south ties and reunification of Korea while resorting to the hostile policy toward the DPRK, defying our warnings, it will be forced to pay a very high price for all the crimes it committed throughout history.

articles.title: Russian, Bangladeshi Papers Highly Praise Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian, Bangladeshi Papers Highly Praise Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Russian and Bangladeshi newspapers carried special write-ups and articles on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian paper Byvor on January 30 allotted one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "General Kim Jong Il-peerless patriot and outstanding great man" (February 16 is the greatest national holiday for the people of the DPRK) said:
					
					 The life of Kim Jong Il was the most brilliant life of a great revolutionary who covered the arduous path of the revolution, which no one had traveled, with his iron will and superhuman efforts, holding high the banner of Songun, and was the life of an ardent patriot who devoted his all to the country and people.
					
					 He was a distinguished politician and peerless Songun brilliant commander as he turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 And he was a peerless patriot and father of the nation who made immortal contribution to the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda on January 23 devoted a whole page to a photo-illustrated article praising his exploits.
					
					 The paper also carried a photo of Kim Jong Il's birthplace at the Paektusan Secret Camp and photo showing the panoramic view of Pyongyang City.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits on January 21 in an article titled "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" stressed that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a country manufacturing and launching satellites and a nuclear weapons state. It is absolutely the results of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the paper stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Romanian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Romanian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, posted an article on the website "The Juche Idea" on January 29 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a great leader who devoted his all to the happiness of the people, socialist construction in the DPRK, reunification of the country and global peace and security and made a great contribution to realizing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Korean people could hold another distinguished leader in high esteem and the DPRK demonstrate its dignity and might as an invincible socialist power guided by the Juche idea as he was born.
					
					 That's why the Korean people instituted the birthday of the great man as the Day of the Shining Star and have significantly celebrated it.
					
					 His immortal exploits will be kept deep in the hearts of all people.
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania and all its members and followers of the Juche idea will significantly mark the Day of the Shining Star together with the Korean people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Libya
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Libya
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Libyan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Tarabulus on February 2.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association who doubles as general director of the Sunbula International Friendship Club was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminar and photo and book exhibition to praise the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Bulgaria, Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Bulgaria, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Korean photo, book and handicrafts exhibition and a photo exhibition week opened in Bulgaria and Nigeria with due ceremonies on Feb. 2 in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing his revolutionary career and undying exploits.
					
					 Also on show were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of Koreans.
					
					 The curator of the Kozloduy City Cultural House in Bulgaria made the following address:
					
					 I am pleased to see the achievements made by the Korean people in all fields at the DPRK photo, book and handicrafts exhibition.
					
					 I hope the exhibition will contribute to deepening the friendship between the peoples of the two countries and boosting cultural exchange and cooperation.
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory in Nigeria said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted himself to instilling the spirit of national self-esteem into the Korean people.
					
					 He increased the military strength in every way against the vicious anti-DPRK maneuvers of the imperialist allied forces, holding high the banner of Songun, and thus prevented a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and defended the destiny of the whole Korean nation.
					
					 He resolutely foiled the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in pamphlet by a publishing house in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
					 The work, made public on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. It serves as a great programme for the party building and activities as it indicates the ways of developing the party into the party of Kim Il Sung for all ages.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on February 3.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica 3 de Octubre de fuerzas maritimas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica 3 de Octubre de fuerzas maritimas de EPC
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica 3 de Octubre adscrita a la unidad 597 de las fuerzas maritimas del EPC y presento las tareas para su modernizacion.
					El Mariscal recorrio primero el monumento a la visita de orientacion de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial de la fabrica.
					
					Al presenciar los datos significados, el recordo con emocion la trayectoria de desarrollo de la fabrica constituida en julio de 1947 como primera base de reparacion de buques  de guerra de nuestro pais, segun la ensenanza del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					En el ultimo ano de su vida, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito la fabrica, subrayo la importancia de su mision y presento las tareas programaticas que servian de guia en la administracion de la fabrica, senalo.
					
					Gracias a la perspicacia de los grandes lideres, las flotas del Mar Este y el Oeste de las fuerzas maritimas del EPC pudieron disponer de la base material y tecnica que posibilita reparar en breve tiempo cualquier buque de combate, dijo.
					
					Pasando revista varios puntos inclusive la brigada de reparacion de motor, la de aparatos electronicos, la de elaboracion, el lugar de pruebas, el dique y el muelle averiguo en detalle sobre el estado de reparacion, la condicion de trabajo y la condicion de vida de los empleados.
					
					El ordeno modernizar el proceso productivo conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la economia intelectual para cumplir con exito las tareas para reparacion y aportar activamente a la modernizacion de buques.
					
					Hay que renovar el interior y el exterior de la fabrica en contraste con el aspecto anterior y acondicionar perfectamente los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico y la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos, dijo.
					
					Y ordeno dotarla mejor con los establecimientos purificadores, conforme a la demanda cientifica y tecnica, para que las aguas residuales de la fabrica no contaminen el mar.
					
					La mision de la Fabrica 3 de Octubre adscrita a la unidad 597 de las fuerzas maritimas del EPC es muy importante en el desarrollo de nuestras fuerzas armadas maritimas, senalo y agrego que el mismo ayudara a resolver todos  los problemas pendientes para transformarla en el modelo de la fabrica de reparacion de barcos de nuestro pais.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que la fabrica se remodelara con excelencia con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea para hacer gran aporte a la reparacion y modernizacion de los buques de combate de todo tipo y al desarrollo de la  industria naval del pais.
					
					Le acompanaron el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Hong Yong Chil.
